Html:
I can not find any example of how to implement the datagrid, i have downloaded the toolkit, added a ref to the Dll.

Now how do i data bind to a grid?
You can find a bunch of examples here http://blogs.msdn.com/vinsibal/archive/tags/DataGrid/default.aspx and here http://www.codeproject.com/KB/WPF/WPFDataGridExamples.aspx.
